locationDescriptions.description: Go on an African Safari and visit African mammals hailing from the savannas of the north to the mountains of the south.

locationDescriptions.location: Racine Rotary West Safari Base Camp
locationDescriptions.description: This beautiful space overlooking Lake Michigan is perfect for a picnic. You may also rent this space for your party or other event.
Get up close and personal with native raptors in this exhibit. Look high up on the perches to spot one of our feathered friends!
Swing like a monkey or hop like a kangaroo on our giant play zoo playground!
Enjoy free seasonal wildlife programs, or when it’s quiet step in to enjoy a peaceful view of the native wildlife in zoo pond.
Home to a variety of turtles, frogs, birds, and other animals, our Zoo Pond includes great places to enjoy our native wildlife that live alongside us.
Wander around bear ridge to view our charismatic Andean Bears! Be sure to visit all three windows to spot them playing, foraging, or taking a nap.
Home to both our meerkats and our African Penguins, this exhibit joins sand and surf for two of our most playful groups of animals!
Watch a tiger patrol their territory, a lynx scale a rock wall, or come face to face with a lion in our Great Cat Canyon
A fun play land for the little ones in your group, this playground features climbing, small slides and a sandbox with toys to engage your child’s creativity.
Time for lunch? How about a snack? Our Jungle Grill seasonally serves up delicious food. Eat inside or enjoy your meal at a picnic table overlooking our Walkabout Creek.
G’Day Mate! Watch a kangaroo hop right in front of you in this open concept exhibit. Be sure to look for the wallaroos as well – they are smaller and darker than the kangaroos!
Turtles, bats, snakes and more from all over the world are waiting to be discovered in the Benstead Discovery Center.
Meet endangered species from around the world and learn about what you can do to help in our Vanishing Kingdom exhibit, located inside the oldest building at the zoo!
Make some friends on the farm  - seasonally, meet and groom goats, sheep, pigs and more!
Feed and visit with colorful, talkative birds that are sure to delight the whole family.

locationDescriptions.location: Junior League of Racine Zoo Choo Express Train Depot
locationDescriptions.description: All aboard! Join us for a relaxing cruise through the zoo on our Zoo Choo Express, open seasonally.

The Zootique, Racine Zoo's dynamic gift shop offers exclusive apparel, souvenirs, and gifts for the whole family. Guests can find everything from postcards to magic socks and a few four foot plush giraffes!
